expression.simple_expression:
"

This is a model for a parallel arrangement of identical variable speed fans (or fan array).

  • All fans are commanded On with the same Boolean signal y1 (VFD Run).
  • The speed of all fans is modulated with the same fractional speed signal y (real).
    y = 0 corresponds to 0 Hz. y = 1 corresponds to the maximum speed set in the VFD.
  • A unique status signal y1_actual (Boolean) is returned.
    y1_actual = true means that all fans are On.
"
